title: Refresh button not working
description: When I click the 'Refresh' button at the top of the main menu. It doesn't actually refresh the page. This is troublesome because I need to be able to view the most up-to-date reports when I'm writing up my talking points for daily meetings. Please put a high priority on this because it's terribly inconvenient for me!
devNotes: I've confirmed that the refresh button is -in fact- working as intended. It appears as though Mr. Willis' subordinates just aren't submitting their reports on time like he expects them to. I got the go-ahead from Juan to archive this since there weren't any code changes to make.

title: Can login without entering password
description: I was able to enter 'admin' as the username and login without entering a password.
devNotes: Tracked the issue to the verify login function. Working on a fix to ensure user must enter a password in the login field and verifies it against the stored password.

title: Submit button not working.
description: While trying to submit a report to QA the submit button appears to not be working.
devNotes: Currently running tests to see if the error can be repeated.

title: Can't find 'Help' button...
description: The latest update apparently makes the 'Help' button invisible because I can't seem to find it...  Please bring it back!

title: Double-clicking on the "Submit" button freezes the program.
description: I was trying to make a submission and I double-clicked the "Submit" button...  It broke the program and it just hung forever.  I was able to restart it and successfully make my submission with a single-click, but this is an annoying issue that needs to be fixed immediately.
